title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman
alternative_title: Space Knight Tekkaman, Tekkaman, the Space Knight, 宇宙の騎士テッカマン
description: Tekkaman is just an average bright boy in his everyday life. However, modern science can turn him into a mighty space warrior. This becomes a reality when aggressive aliens come from space to invade our planet. Armed with a space lance, Tekkaman gallantly goes into action against the grotesque space creatures. During his battles he encounters a mysterious young man from another planet who helps him out whenever he is in danger.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Space>]
